creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: mirror with painting (in Chinese style) representing pavillion at water's edge on which three adults and a child are grouped about a table; a servant (?) approaches carrying a book; islands, temples, trees and a sailing junk in background; moulded walnut frame in four sections
title: Reverse painting with mirrored background
